name: vietjet-load-tests
description: Load testing suite for VietJet Clone backend

scripts.test:artillery:report: artillery run artillery-booking-flow.yml --output results/artillery-report.json && artillery report results/artillery-report.json
scripts.test:all: npm run test:quick && npm run test:artillery && npm run test:k6
scripts.install:tools: npm install -g artillery autocannon && echo 'Install k6 manually from https://k6.io'
